text: The Egyptians are No Help
Ah! Those who go down \add to\add* Egypt for help!
They rely on horses
and trust in chariots because \add they are\add* many,
and in horsemen because they are very numerous,
and they do not look to the holy one of Israel,
and they do not consult Yahweh.
And indeed, he \add is\add* wise, and he brings disaster,
and he does not remove his words,
and he will rise against \add the\add* house of evildoers
and against \add the\add* help of workers of iniquity.
And the Egyptians \add are\add* human and not God,
and their horses \add are\add* flesh and not spirit.
And Yahweh stretches out his hand,
and \add the\add* helper will stumble,
and \add the\add* one being helped will fall,
and together all of them will come to an end.\f + \fr 31:3 \ft Or “perish” \f*
For Yahweh said this to me:
“As which \add a\add* lion growls
and \add a\add* young lion over its prey
when ⸤a full group⸥\f + \fr 31:4 \ft Literally “fullness” \f* of shepherds is called against him,
it is not terrified by their voice,
and to their noise it does not respond,
so Yahweh of hosts will come down to fight upon Mount Zion
and upon its hill.
Like birds flying \add overhead\add*, so Yahweh of hosts will protect Jerusalem;
he will protect and deliver \add it\add*;
he will pass over and rescue \add it\add*.
Turn back to \add the one against\add* whom the sons of Israel have made deep rebellion.
For on that day, each one will reject his idols of silver
and his idols of gold which your hands have made \add in\add* sin for you.
And Assyria shall fall by a sword not \add of\add* a man,
and a sword not \add of\add* a human shall devour him;
and he shall flee from \add the\add* sword,
and his young men shall be \add put\add* to forced labor.
And his rock will pass over because of terror,
and his officers will be terrified because of \add the\add* flag,”
⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 31:9 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* Yahweh,
who has a fire in Zion
and has a furnace in Jerusalem.
